tosdr.case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
quoteText: You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality and security of your username and password, and you will remain responsible for all use of your username and password, and all activity emanating from your account, whether or not such activity was authorized by you.
